howItWorks.heading: How It Works

steps.title: Define Layers

items.question: What types of images work best for the parallax effect?
items.answer: High-resolution images with clear subjects and defined backgrounds yield the best results. Images should ideally be at least 512x512 pixels to properly highlight depth.

items.question: Can I customize the motion effects of the parallax?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can specify different motions like panning or zooming to create unique visual experiences tailored to your needs.

items.question: Is the parallax effect suitable for all types of content?
items.answer: Yes! The parallax effect enhances product images, promotional graphics, and social media visuals, making them more engaging across all platforms.

items.question: What is the average time for generating a parallax effect?
items.answer: Typically, generating a parallax effect takes between 1-2 minutes, making it quick and efficient for immediate use.

items.question: Do I need design skills to use this feature?
items.answer: No design skills are required! Our interface is intuitive, allowing anyone to create dynamic visuals effortlessly.

items.question: Are there usage rights for the created content?
items.answer: Yes! All visuals generated through our platform come with full commercial rights, allowing you to use them without additional fees.

items.question: Can I use different images for the effect?
items.answer: Yes! You can create multiple effects using various images to suit different projects or needs.

items.question: What support resources are available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive documentation, tutorials, and customer support available via email and live chat for any questions or troubleshooting.
